{{ddcl | since=c++23 |
constexpr native_handle_type native_handle() const noexcept;
}}

Returns the implementation-defined underlying native handle. Successive invocations of this function for an unchanged {{tt|stacktrace_entry}} object return identical values.

The semantics of this function is implementation-defined.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
Underlying native handle.
